39 BlackBoxNode::BlackBoxNode() : home_dir_(getenv("HOME"))
40 {
41  p_exec = [&](const char* cmd) { return exec(cmd); };
42  p_system = [&](const char* cmd) { return system(cmd); };
43  p_time = [&](void) { return (long int)time(0); };
44  p_get_files = [&](string path) { return getFiles(path); };
45 }
46 
47 const string BlackBoxNode::NODE_NAME = "/black_box/";
48 string BAG_FOLDER = "bags";
49 
50 string BlackBoxNode::getFilePath(string name)
51 {
52  return home_dir_ + NODE_NAME + name;
53 }
54 
55 void BlackBoxNode::log(const string& message)
56 {
57  ROS_WARN("%s", message.c_str());
58 }
59 
60 string BlackBoxNode::exec(const char* cmd)
61 {
62  array<char, 128> buffer;
63  string result;
64  shared_ptr<FILE> pipe(popen(cmd, "r"), pclose);
65  if (!pipe)
66  throw runtime_error("popen() failed!");
67  while (!feof(pipe.get()))
68  {
69  if (fgets(buffer.data(), 128, pipe.get()) != nullptr)
70  result += buffer.data();
71  }
72  return result;
73 }
74 
75 bool BlackBoxNode::playback_(Playback::Request& req, Playback::Response& res)
76 {
77  p_system("killall rosbag");
78  p_system("pkill -f time_publisher.sh");
79  if (req.play)
80  {
81  char buff[200];
82  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), "roslaunch blackbox_control rosbag.launch BAGS:=%s/* START_POS:=%d &", getFilePath(BAG_FOLDER).c_str(), req.pos);
83  p_system(buff);
84  }
85 
86  return true;
87 }
88 
89 vector<string> BlackBoxNode::getFiles(string path)
90 {
91  auto dirp = opendir(path.c_str());
92  dirent* dp;
93  vector<string> files;
94 
95  if (!dirp)
96  return files;
97 
98  while ((dp = readdir(dirp)) != NULL)
99  {
100  string name = dp->d_name;
101  if (name != "." && name != "..")
102  {
103  // log(name);
104  files.push_back(name);
105  }
106  }
107  std::sort(files.begin(), files.end());
108 
109  (void)closedir(dirp);
110 
111  return files;
112 }
113 
114 int BlackBoxNode::parseDate(string fileName) // format: bb_2017-11-24-18-11-43.bag
115 {
116  fileName = fileName.substr(3, 19); // cut off bb_, index and extension
117  tm t = {};
118  istringstream ss(fileName);
119  ss >> get_time(&t, "%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S");
120  return static_cast<long int>(mktime(&t));
121 }
122 
123 string BlackBoxNode::exportFileName()
124 {
125  char buff[100000];
126  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), "black_box_export_%ld.zip", p_time());
127  return string(buff);
128 }
129 
130 bool BlackBoxNode::export_(Export::Request& req, Export::Response& res)
131 {
132  auto files = p_get_files(getFilePath(BAG_FOLDER));
133  string filtered_files;
134  for (int i = 0; i < (int)files.size(); i++)
135  {
136  int file_date = parseDate(files[i]);
137  if (file_date >= req.begin && file_date <= req.end)
138  {
139  filtered_files += files[i] + " ";
140  }
141  }
142 
143  string file_name = exportFileName();
144  if (filtered_files.size() > 0)
145  {
146  char buff[100000];
147 
148  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), "bash -c 'cd %s;zip -FS ~/black_box/archive/%s %s'", getFilePath(BAG_FOLDER).c_str(),
149  file_name.c_str(), filtered_files.c_str());
150  p_system(buff);
151 
152  res.file_name = file_name;
153  }
154 
155  return true;
156 }
157 
158 bool BlackBoxNode::import_(Import::Request& req, Import::Response& res)
159 {
160  char buff[100000];
161  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), "bash -c 'cd %s;rm *;unzip ~/black_box/archive/black_box_import.zip'",
162  getFilePath(BAG_FOLDER).c_str());
163  // log(buff);
164  p_system(buff);
165 
166  return true;
167 }
168 
169 bool BlackBoxNode::getAvailableRange_(GetAvailableRange::Request& req, GetAvailableRange::Response& res)
170 {
171  auto files = p_get_files(getFilePath(BAG_FOLDER));
172  // log(files.front());
173  // log(files.back());
174  // cut only the time part
175  if (files.size() > 0)
176  {
177  res.begin = parseDate(files.front());
178  res.end = parseDate(files.back());
179  }
180 
181  return true;
182 }
183 
184 void BlackBoxNode::init(std::shared_ptr<IRosProxy> rosProxy)
185 {
186  rosProxy->advertiseService(NODE_NAME + "import", &IBlackBoxNode::import_, this);
187  rosProxy->advertiseService(NODE_NAME + "export", &IBlackBoxNode::export_, this);
188  rosProxy->advertiseService(NODE_NAME + "playback", &IBlackBoxNode::playback_, this);
189  rosProxy->advertiseService(NODE_NAME + "get_available_range", &IBlackBoxNode::getAvailableRange_, this);
190 }
191 
192 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
193 {
194  ros::init(argc, argv, "black_box_node");
195  auto rp = shared_ptr<RosProxy>(new RosProxy);
196 
197  BlackBoxNode bbn;
198  bbn.init(rp);
199 
200  bbn.showLogo();
201  bbn.log("PPM Black Box Node Started");
202 
203  ros::spin();
204 
205  return 0;
206 }

208 void BlackBoxNode::showLogo()
209 {
210  cout << std::endl;
211  cout << "***************************************************************************" << std::endl;
212  cout << "* *" << std::endl;
213  cout << "* PPM Black Box - by PPM AS *" << std::endl;
214  cout << "* *" << std::endl;
215  cout << "***************************************************************************" << std::endl << std::endl;
216 }

218 inline bool BlackBoxNode::endsWith(std::string const& value, std::string const& ending)
219 {
220  if (ending.size() > value.size())
221  return false;
222  return std::equal(ending.rbegin(), ending.rend(), value.rbegin());
223 }
